original_text: At the Lord’s command the Israelites set out, and at his command they encamped. As long as the cloud stayed over the tabernacle, they remained in camp.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하였고 여호와의 명령을 따라 진을 쳤으며 구름이 성막 위에 머무는 동안에는 그들이 진영에 머물렀고

sentences.original_text: At the Lord's command the Israelites set out
and at his command they encamped
As long as the cloud stayed over the tabernacle
